text: Kiya aap ney nahi dekha kay Allah Taalaa aasman say paani utaarta hai aur ussay zamin ki sooton mein phonchata hai phir issi kay zariyey mukhtalif qisam ki khetiyan ugata hai phit woh khushk hojati hain aur aap unhen zard rang dekhtay hain phir unhen reza reza ker deta hai iss mein aqalmando kay liye boht ziyadah naseehat hai
